# The `RepairingPlacement` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Struct used to represent the placement of a repairing point for a given operand. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Struct used to represent the placement of a repairing point for a given operand.

Definition at line 314 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::RegBankSelect::RepairingPlacement::RepairingKind ">
Define the kind of action this repairing needs.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a1b5edfd2f0ed3f87981ab15c425b0165" />
<EnumerationListItem name="None">
Nothing to repair, just drop this action
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a07b4fac858ad8fc2c4d9bdc7acd6e195" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Insert">
Reparing code needs to happen before InsertPoints
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a756e97b1942ca89260909cfdfb64b957" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Reassign">
(Re)assign the register bank of the operand
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a98e66b30e93d741af07a3fefeb66ab1b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Impossible">
Mark this repairing placement as impossible
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00317">317</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### RepairingPlacement() {#a40139f3ca5fa604f87136efa9ca611ca}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RegBankSelect::RepairingPlacement::RepairingPlacement (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, unsigned OpIdx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp; TRI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> &amp; P, <a href="#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6">RepairingKind</a> Kind=<a href="#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a07b4fac858ad8fc2c4d9bdc7acd6e195">RepairingKind::Insert</a>)</>}>
Create a repairing placement for the <code>OpIdx-th</code> operand of <code>MI</code>.

<code>TRI</code> is used to make some checks on the register aliases if the machine operand is a physical register. <code>P</code> is used to to update liveness information and such when materializing the points.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00356">356</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00761">761</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### switchTo() {#adb2d45f98e7457256296b0943ddd4a6c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::RegBankSelect::RepairingPlacement::switchTo (<a href="#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6">RepairingKind</a> NewKind)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Change the type of this repairing placement to <code>NewKind</code>.

It is not possible to switch a repairing placement to the <a href="#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a07b4fac858ad8fc2c4d9bdc7acd6e195">RepairingKind::Insert</a>. There is no fundamental problem with that, but no uses as well, so do not support it for now.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
NewKind != <a href="#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a07b4fac858ad8fc2c4d9bdc7acd6e195">RepairingKind::Insert</a>
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
<a href="#aa7cdfa61d3992d77bec94e1eda33bbc9">getKind()</a> == NewKind
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00399">399</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

### addInsertPoint {#a7280cb5ef0246479249f33a11b1cf92a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RegBankSelect::RepairingPlacement::addInsertPoint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; Src, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; Dst)</>}>
